info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:51PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pima County through 330 PM MST... At 250 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Topawa, or 10 miles southeast of Sells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Ali Chukson, Fresnal, Comobabi, South Comobabi, Fresnal Canyon, Artesia, Pan Tak and Ali Molina. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 115 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
